column4: Is it possible to install OPenOffice 3 in Hardy Heron/Gnome desktop ? ?
there is a repository for OO3 packages
Can I install this with sudo apt-get install - Do I need to 1st uninstall anything from the older version that is currently installed ? ?
I believe it installs in paralell, please check the link that I have provided
oh you are using hardy, I believe the repository provides a section for hardy, it should work, you just need to replace intrepid with hardy on the repository lines
